content: Created a GitHub Actions CI workflow that runs locked-dependency lint/tests plus benchmark reproducibility checks on the host Python runner and again inside the built Docker image, printing Python environment metadata to aid reproducible v0.1.0 release gating.

output.code:
from pathlib import Path
import json

target_path = Path('/mnt/data').joinpath('.github/workflows/ci.yml')
target_path.parent.mkdir(parents=True, exist_ok=True)

chunks = [
"""name: CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [main]
    tags: ["v*"]
  pull_request:

concurrency:
  group: ci-${{ github.ref }}
  cancel-in-progress: true""",
"""jobs:
  host:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      fail-fast: false
      matrix:
        python-version: ["3.11"]
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: ${{ matrix.python-version }}
          cache: pip
      - name: Install Poetry
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          python -m pip install poetry==1.8.3
          poetry --version
      - name: Install dependencies (locked)
        run: |
          poetry env use "${{ matrix.python-version }}"
          poetry install --no-interaction --no-ansi
      - name: Environment metadata
        run: |
          poetry run python -VV
          poetry run python -c "import json,platform,sys;print(json.dumps({'python':sys.version,'implementation':platform.python_implementation(),'platform':platform.platform()},indent=2,sort_keys=True))"
      - name: Lint
        run: poetry run ruff check .
      - name: Tests
        run: poetry run pytest -q
      - name: Benchmark reproducibility gate
        run: poetry run pytest -q tests/test_benchmark_reproducibility.py""",
"""  docker:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: host
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - name: Build image
        run: docker build -t repro:ci .
      - name: Container metadata
        run: docker run --rm repro:ci python -VV
      - name: Lint (container)
        run: docker run --rm repro:ci ruff check .
      - name: Tests (container)
        run: docker run --rm repro:ci pytest -q
      - name: Benchmark reproducibility gate (container)
        run: docker run --rm repro:ci pytest -q tests/test_benchmark_reproducibility.py"""
]

final_text = '\n'.join(block.strip('\n') for block in chunks).strip() + '\n'
target_path.write_text(final_text, encoding='utf-8')

print('FILE_WRITTEN:.github/workflows/ci.yml')
print('DIR_STATE:' + json.dumps(sorted(str(p.relative_to(Path("/mnt/data"))) for p in target_path.parent.glob('*') if p.is_file())))

content.text: Created a GitHub Actions CI workflow that runs locked-dependency lint/tests plus benchmark reproducibility checks on the host Python runner and again inside the built Docker image, printing Python environment metadata to aid reproducible v0.1.0 release gating.
